general.gigTitle: design and develop a modern wordpress website

sellerCard.description: Freelance Visual Designer with over 6 years of experience, with over 2800 projects completed. My goal is to understand your brand so I can translate it into a creative and powerful resource. I make sure to provide my clients the best experience in terms of quality, speediness and an excellent customer service.

description.content:
Please contact me before placing your order, so that we can analyze your project and help or advise you in choosing the best option for you.


Are you looking to create a modern and intuitive website that helps boost your sales and strengthens your position in the market against your competitors? Do you need a truly customized project that fits your needs and is scalable for the future? If the answer is yes, we are here to help.


Our packages include:

  • Custom design for all our websites (mobile-first approach).
  • Fully responsive designs (Mobile, tablets, PC, and more).
  • Organic SEO optimization included, to improve your search engine ranking.
  • Optimization of all our sites to ensure fast loading times and responsiveness.


Why work with us

  • We are a qualified team with over 15 years of experience in this industry
  • Experience in all sectors or types of websites
  • 100% of our projects completed to satisfaction
  • We comply with Googles quality and security parameters.


Upon final delivery, you will be provided with credentials to access and have full control of your fully operational website (WordPress).

design and develop a modern wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need from you to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Your brand/company name (logo)
Organized and pre-reviewed content for your website
Your color palette (If you don't have one, we can make a proposal)
Your corporate font (If you don't have one, we can make a proposal)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Project workflow
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1. Initial contact
2. Requirements gathering
3. Design proposal creation and presentation
4.Site implementation
5.Delivery

packageList.title: One-page Website
packageList.description: Fully responsive, SEO optimized, fast loading and secure + 1 month free hosting and SSL certificate

packageList.title: Business Website
packageList.description: Fully responsive, SEO optimized, fast loading and secure + 2 months free hosting and SSL certificate

packageList.title: E-commerce Website
packageList.description: Fully responsive, SEO optimized, fast loading and secure + 3 months free hosting and SSL certificate

reviews.comment: Leda's skills are truly phenomenal! Her professionalism shone through with a bug-free delivery that EXCEEDED our expectations. Working with her was a breeze due to her quick responsiveness and politeness. Highly recommend!
Great work from Leda as always! Highly recommend.
